title: Tasmanian aborigines and the historic importance of the River Nile
itunes:title: Tasmanian aborigines and the historic importance of the River Nile
itunes:subtitle: Tom Lawson talks about the often-brutal experiences of the people of Tasmania, while Toby Wilkinson explores the historic importance of the River Nile  See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
